thread.title: Watch a Pregnant Natalie Portman Star in James Blake’s “My Willing Heart”
thread.title_full: Watch a Pregnant Natalie Portman Star in James Blake’s “My Willing Heart”

author: Jonathan Sawyer
title: Watch a Pregnant Natalie Portman Star in James Blake’s “My Willing Heart”
text:
James Blake is back in support of 2016’s The Colour In Anything , releasing the official music video for “My Willing Heart.” Directed by Anna Rose Holmer, the aesthetic in turn stars famed actress Natalie Portman .
According to a press release, the visual was shot just days before Portman gave birth to her daughter. In the moody black and white clip, she can thus be seen lying in bed and resting underwater.
See above to take it all in.
